name: Polarsysmaturity
tagline: Tools used in the maturity assessment for PolarSys.
body:
# PolarsysMaturity

This repository is for development of tools used in the [https://polarsys.org/wiki/Maturity_Assessment_WG](Maturity Assessment task force) of the [https://polarsys.org/wiki/](PolarSys working group).

## Quality model visualisation

This javascript code allows to visualise the quality model being defined for maturity assessment. Please note that any remark on the quality model itself should be sent to PolarSys mailing lists, not the GitHub page.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
